0.text: Innate: Mordekaiser's basic attacks are empowered to deal 40% AP bonus magic damage  on-hit.
0.html: Innate: Mordekaiser's basic attacks are empowered to deal 40% AP bonus magic damage on-hit.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Morderkaiser generates a stack for each enemy  champion or  monster hit by his damaging basic attacks or basic abilities, lasting for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Mordekaiser gains Darkness Rise.
1.html: Morderkaiser generates a stack for each enemy champion or monster hit by his damaging basic attacks or basic abilities, lasting for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Mordekaiser gains Darkness Rise.
markedPassages: champion
monster

2.text: Darkness Rise: Mordekaiser gains  3 / 6 / 9% (based on level) bonus movement speed and creates an aura that deals「 5 − 15.2 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) (+ 1% − 5% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage per second 」「 0.63 − 1.9 (based on level) (+ 3.75% AP) (+ 0.13% − 0.63% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.125 seconds 」to nearby enemies. The damage per second against monsters is capped at 180.
2.html: Darkness Rise: Mordekaiser gains  3 / 6 / 9% (based on level) bonus movement speed and creates an aura that deals「 5 − 15.2 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) (+ 1% − 5% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage per second 」「 0.63 − 1.9 (based on level) (+ 3.75% AP) (+ 0.13% − 0.63% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.125 seconds 」to nearby enemies. The damage per second against monsters is capped at 180.
markedPassages: 3 / 6 / 9% (based on level) bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Mordekaiser smashes the area in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within,  increased if it hits only one enemy.
0.html: Active: Mordekaiser smashes the area in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within, increased if it hits only one enemy.

0.text: Passive: Mordekaiser stores 45% of the post-mitigation damage he deals and 15% of the pre-mitigation damage he takes,「 reduced by 75% for non-champion sources, 」「 reduced to 11.25% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources, 」as Potential Shield on his secondary resource bar, up to  30% of his maximum health. The Potential Shield decays by 8 − 25 (based on level) every second after not dealing or taking damage for 1 second. While Indestructible is not on cooldown, the Potential Shield will not decay below a minimum of 5% of his maximum health, and it will be set to that amount when it comes off cooldown if it was previously below it.
0.html: Passive: Mordekaiser stores 45% of the post-mitigation damage he deals and 15% of the pre-mitigation damage he takes,「 reduced by 75% for non-champion sources, 」「 reduced to 11.25% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources, 」as Potential Shield on his secondary resource bar, up to  30% of his maximum health. The Potential Shield decays by 8 − 25 (based on level) every second after not dealing or taking damage for 1 second. While Indestructible is not on cooldown, the Potential Shield will not decay below a minimum of 5% of his maximum health, and it will be set to that amount when it comes off cooldown if it was previously below it.
markedPassages: 「 reduced by 75% for non-champion sources, 」「 reduced to 11.25% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources, 」
「 reduced to 11.<small>25</small>% of damage dealt and 3.<small>75</small>% of damage taken for non-champion sources, 」
「 reduced to 11.25% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources, 」
30% of his maximum health

1.text: Active: Mordekaiser consumes his Potential Shield to  shield himself for 4 seconds for the same amount. The shield decays exponentially over the duration. Indestructible can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the shield is active.
1.html: Active: Mordekaiser consumes his Potential Shield to shield himself for 4 seconds for the same amount. The shield decays exponentially over the duration. Indestructible can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the shield is active.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: Recast: Mordekaiser consumes the remaining shield,  healing for a portion of the amount.
2.html: Recast: Mordekaiser consumes the remaining shield, healing for a portion of the amount.
markedPassages: healing

0.html: Passive: Mordekaiser gains  magic penetration.
markedPassages: magic penetration

1.text: Active: Mordekaiser summons a claw in the target direction that grants  sight of the area. After 0.5 seconds, it deals magic damage to enemies within and  pulls them 250 units.
1.html: Active: Mordekaiser summons a claw in the target direction that grants sight of the area. After 0.5 seconds, it deals magic damage to enemies within and pulls them 250 units.
markedPassages: sight
pulls

0.text: Active: Mordekaiser  slows the target enemy champion by 75% during the cast time, then  banishes them with him to the Death Realm for 7 seconds. Mordekaiser also consumes the target's soul for 7 seconds,  healing himself for 10% of their maximum health and reducing their current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,   maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. If the target dies while inside the Death Realm, Mordekaiser keeps their partial stats until they respawn.
0.html:
Active: Mordekaiser slows the target enemy champion by 75% during the cast time, then banishes them with him to the Death Realm for 7 seconds.

Mordekaiser also consumes the target's soul for 7 seconds, healing himself for 10% of their maximum health and reducing their current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,  maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. If the target dies while inside the Death Realm, Mordekaiser keeps their partial stats until they respawn.
markedPassages: slows
healing
attack damage
ability power
total attack speed
maximum health
maximum health
armor
magic resist

1.text: Units between realms see each other as spirits, considering each other dead and negating any interactions between each other. Only Mordekaiser and the target will enter the realm; other champions cannot follow them. Everything that occurs inside the Death Realm is hidden to units outside of it, and all  pets still inside are killed at the end.
1.html: Units between realms see each other as spirits, considering each other dead and negating any interactions between each other. Only Mordekaiser and the target will enter the realm; other champions cannot follow them. Everything that occurs inside the Death Realm is hidden to units outside of it, and all pets still inside are killed at the end.
markedPassages: pets

2.text: If one of the two affected champions leave the Death Realm, because of having died or having it dispelled, the other will do so as well.
2.html: If one of the two affected champions leave the Death Realm, because of having died or having it dispelled, the other will do so as well.
possibleConcerningAbilities: If one of the two affected champions leave the Death Realm, because of having died or having it dispelled, the other will do so as well.

0.text: Active: Mordekaiser  slows the target enemy champion by 75% during the cast time, then  banishes them with him to the Death Realm for 7 seconds. Mordekaiser also consumes the target's soul for 7 seconds,  healing himself for 10% of their maximum health and reducing their current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,   maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. Mordekaiser also consumes the target's soul for 7 seconds, healing himself for 10% of their maximum health and reducing their current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,  maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. 1.text: Units between realms see each other as spirits, considering each other dead and negating any interactions between each other. Only Mordekaiser and the target will enter the realm; other champions cannot follow them. Everything that occurs inside the Death Realm is hidden to units outside of it, and all  pets still inside are killed at the end.
